alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Thomas; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Outflow winds from Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Cherry, southern Brown, northwestern Blaine and northeastern Thomas Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Rose to near Thedford. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Thedford, Purdum, Brownlee, Elsmere, Hofeld Lake, Raven, Moon Lake, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Highway 83 crossing the North Loup River, Koshopah, Jones Lake, Natwick and Johnsons Corner. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 210 and 220. Highway 83 between mile markers 146 and 174. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Thomas; Western Cherry
